theoryTitle: Yami Yami no Mi is Actually a Mythical Zoan
theoryText: Despite being classified as a Logia, the Yami Yami no Mi may actually be a Mythical Zoan Devil Fruit, similar to how Luffy's Gomu Gomu no Mi was revealed to be the Hito Hito no Mi: Model Nika. This would explain its unique properties, such as the inability to dodge attacks by turning into an element and its special power to nullify other Devil Fruits.

theoryTitle: Blackbeard Never Sleeps Due to Devil Fruit Control
theoryText: Blackbeard's inability to sleep, mentioned earlier in the series, may be connected to his Devil Fruit powers. Controlling the Yami Yami no Mi (and later acquiring a second fruit) requires constant effort that forbids him from sleeping. This constant vigilance might be necessary to prevent the fruits from destroying him.

theoryTitle: Yami Yami no Mi's Gravity Allows Multiple Devil Fruits
theoryText: The gravitational properties of the Yami Yami no Mi, which makes Blackbeard a 'Black Hole Man,' allows him to trap the essence of other Devil Fruits by sealing them within his body. This unique property of the darkness fruit is what enables Blackbeard to possess multiple Devil Fruit powers without dying, as the Yami Yami no Mi keeps the conflicting fruit essences separated.

theoryTitle: Ace's Defeat Was Inevitable Due to Devil Fruit Matchup
theoryText: The battle between Ace and Blackbeard was doomed from the start because the Yami Yami no Mi is a natural counter to all Devil Fruit users, especially Logia types like Ace. The nullification ability upon contact meant that Ace, who relied heavily on his Mera Mera no Mi, was at a fundamental disadvantage. This wasn't about power levels but about a bad matchup.

theoryTitle: The Duel on Banaro Island Was Meant to Happen
theoryText: Some fans theorize that the confrontation between Ace and Blackbeard was orchestrated or at least anticipated by Blackbeard. He knew Ace would come after him for killing Thatch, and he deliberately chose to fight Ace to prove his strength and capture him, knowing it would lead to his acceptance as a Warlord and eventually allow him to infiltrate Impel Down to recruit powerful prisoners.

Building on the revelation in Episode 325 that Blackbeard can possess the Yami Yami no Mi and later gains a second fruit, many fans theorize he will eventually obtain a third Devil Fruit. The Yami Yami no Mi's ability to absorb and contain everything makes it plausible that Blackbeard could continue collecting powerful fruits, possibly including a Mythical Zoan to complete a trinity of Logia, Paramecia, and Zoan.
